company_name: PT. Gunung Ansa (Harris Vertu & Yello Hotels Harmoni)
recommended_degree: Akuntansi, Administrasi Bisnis, Perpajakan, Manajemen Keuangan, Manajemen Akuntansi Hospitaliti (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Responsibilities:
Assist in daily accounting operations such as invoice processing, data entry, and filing.
Support Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable tasks (checking invoices, posting payments, preparing summaries).
Help reconcile financial records, including cash, bank statements, and revenue reports.
Assist in preparing monthly financial reports and audit documents.
Coordinate with other hotel departments to collect necessary financial information.
Maintain organized and accurate accounting documentation.
Support the Finance team with general administrative tasks.
